name: RefreshSessionRecordingSharing
description:
Refreshes the sharing status of a session recording.

Use this tool to refresh the sharing status of a specific session recording within a project environment. Call this when you need to renew access or update the sharing link of a session recording using its project and recording identifiers.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the project. Retrieve it using the /api/projects/ endpoint.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: session_recording_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the session recording to refresh sharing status. Required to specify which recording's sharing status to update.

parameters.name: session_recording_sharing_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details for refreshing session recording sharing, including creation date, status, access token, settings, and password requirements.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
